BUILD WITH SUPRA

#####

# Build a better Web3  
with better data

##### Upgrade your smart contract with accurate, secure,  
stable, and blazing fast data feeds from Supra's cross-  
chain oracle solution.

  

BUILD ON SUPRASEE ALL PRICE PAIRS

#### Data Feeds Powered by Supra

##### SupraOracles is now

As we move towards our goal of building a better Web3, our reach now extends
beyond oracles. With Supra dVRF  
live on mainnet, and our answer to bridges underway, we have updated our name
to reflect our focus.

##### Our oracle data feeds are live on 40+ networks

### Supercharging  
Web3 for a better,  
decentralized future

Web3 needs faster, more secure, more  
decentralized blockchain infrastructure. That’s  
what we’re building. With 5+ years of R&D and a  
series of technical breakthroughs, we’re building  
native cross-chain solutions to help your smart  
contracts and blockchain apps work better.

We’re not bragging. We just build better.

#### Supra Oracles

Upgrade to reliable high-  
speed data feeds that  
stay up-to-date with full  
finality in under 2-3  
seconds.

LEARN MORE

#### Supra dVRF

Build dApps that inspire  
confidence with  
impossible-to-manipulate  
VRFs with on-chain proof.

LEARN MORE

#### IntraLayer

Build cross-chain enabled  
protocols that connect to  
the most popular  
networks seamlessly.

LEARN MORE

#### Supra closes early stage fundraising with over $24M from top VCs

#### Get to know the Supra research team

#### Third whitepaper out now: Moonshot Consensus Protocol

#### HyperNovaThe future of bridgeless  
cross-chain interoperability

### Built for top blockchain networks

Supra unlocks limitless interoperability. We are pioneering cross-chain
solutions with integrations across all major and  
rising L1 and L2 ecosystems — to supercharge Web3 applications across the
board.

##### Now Live on 46 Mainnets

  * Oracles
  * dVRF

Countdown to Blast Off

Get exciting alpha and win prizes

## Join the 400M $SUPRA token airdrop!

JOIN NOW

### Data sourced from  
crypto powerhouses

Our price feeds run on data from crypto's most  
reliable sources, all vetted and published in real-  
time by our novel randomized tribes and clans  
node network to optimize for accuracy, stability,  
and fast finality.

SEE ALL DATA PROVIDERS

SEE ALL DATA PROVIDERS

### The foundation of all our solutions:  
Tribes and Clans consensus network

Our oracles, dVRF, and all upcoming solutions are being built on top of a
novel  
consensus algorithm and security network design. A key innovation that brings  
native Layer 1 blockchain-grade security to all Supra products without  
compromising on performance speed, scalability, or decentralization.

##### PLAY VIDEO

VISIT THE RESEARCH CENTER

### Programs & Accelerators

Supra has earned recognition and credibility by qualifying for notable
accelerators and  
incubator programs, raising $1M in awards, grants, and credits alone.

### As seen in

“SupraOracles’ ability to operate in such a fast, reliable, and highly
decentralized way will enable new game-changing applications.”

Spokesperson

FiveT Ventures

randomness will be a great addition to the collective intelligence of Web3.”

Spokesperson

SupraOracles did their research on L1 consensus for oracles.”

Republic Advisory

“We believe SupraOracles’ technology will be a key component of DeFi,
significantly increasing transaction finality to mere seconds, while improving
security and enabling cross-chain interoperability.”

##### PLAY VIDEO

### Get free Data Feeds and VRFs

The Supra Network Activate Program (SNAP) is a limited pilot program that
offers  
companies discounted services and technical support to embed much-needed  
oracles and dVRFs. SNAP helps selected high-potential Web3 projects scale  
and grow with free services for 6 months and up to 90% off for 18 months.

APPLY NOW

#### Get news, insights, and more

Sign up for the Supra newsletter for company news, industry insights, and
more. You’ll also be the first to know when we come out of stealth mode.
